# LLMS.TXT - EranFixer Professional Information

## Company Overview
Company: Eran Fixer (ערן פיקסר)
Website: https://eran-fixer.com
Founded: 2018
Location: Tel Aviv, Israel
Languages: Hebrew (primary), English

## Business Description
EranFixer is a leading digital solutions company specializing in advanced web development, professional SEO, AI-powered business automation, and digital reputation management. We serve businesses of all sizes across Israel and internationally.

## Core Services
1. **Advanced Web Development**
   - React 18 + TypeScript applications
   - Supabase backend integration
   - Custom CMS systems
   - Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
   - Enterprise-level security

2. **Professional SEO Services**
   - Organic search optimization
   - Local SEO for Israeli businesses
   - Technical SEO audits
   - Content strategy and creation
   - Link building campaigns

3. **AI Business Automation**
   - Intelligent chatbots with NLP
   - Automated sales funnels
   - Smart lead management systems
   - Machine learning integrations
   - Customer support automation

4. **Digital Reputation Management (ORM)**
   - 24/7 reputation monitoring
   - Negative content suppression
   - Positive content creation
   - Review management
   - Crisis communication

5. **Custom CRM Systems**
   - Lead management automation
   - Sales pipeline tracking
   - WhatsApp API integration
   - Analytics and reporting
   - Multi-channel communication

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Real-time)
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Hosting**: Netlify, Bolt Hosting
- **Media**: Cloudinary integration
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics 4
- **Performance**: 90+ PageSpeed score

## Target Markets
- Israeli businesses (primary)
- Local service providers
- Professional services (lawyers, doctors, consultants)
- Technology companies
- E-commerce businesses
- International clients (US, Europe, Australia)

## Key Features
- **Multilingual Support**: Hebrew (RTL), English
- **SEO Optimized**: Built-in SEO tools and optimization
- **Mobile-First**: Responsive design for all devices
- **Security**: Enterprise-level security with Supabase Auth
- **Performance**: Optimized for speed and Core Web Vitals
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant

## Competitive Advantages
- 7+ years of proven experience
- 250+ successful projects completed
- 98% client satisfaction rate
- Advanced technology stack (not WordPress)
- Local market expertise in Israel
- International reach and capabilities

## Business Philosophy
"Not just websites - intelligent infrastructure that manages digital assets, creates business value, and delivers measurable results."

## Technology Innovation
- **Fixer CMS Engine**: Next-generation content management platform
- **Custom AI Solutions**: Tailored automation for business processes
- **Advanced SEO Tools**: Built-in optimization without plugins
- **Modern Architecture**: React + Supabase for enterprise performance
